abstract: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell postpones consideration of bill that would require Pres Obama to submit any nuclear agreement with Iran to Congress for approval after Democrats object.
lead_paragraph: Senator Mitch McConnell, Republican of Kentucky and the majority leader, will postpone consideration of a bill giving Congress the authority to review any deal President Obama reaches with Iran on its nuclear program.

headline.main: Senate Will Postpone Debate on Iran
headline.print_headline: Senate Will Postpone Debate on Iran

snippet: Senator Mitch McConnell, Republican of Kentucky and the majority leader, will postpone consideration of a bill giving Congress the authority to review any deal President Obama reaches with Iran on its nuclear program.
